text:
<!here|@here> Given we're on a bit of a pause right now, and that this week has been pretty light, let's cancel today's design check-in. I'll circle back with everyone on the team today to check on specific tasks that were in-flight:
1) 90-day research plan (I'm on it, editing the doc now)
2) Updated hub design (already talked with Felix on this)
3) Hardware proto and the new wine rack
